But in terms of volume, I think you had no problem doing that. So today we are going to shift into something, not volume, but similar.  I shouldn't say similar to volume, but something that we can use this box to find, to help us to start. And that is called a surface area.  So today we’re going to explore finding the surface area of an object, of a rectangular prism.  I’m just going to write this word.  And please write this down in your notebook.
